channel.title: CVE Feed for Kaspersky Lab -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kaspersky Lab -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-8278|2024-09-16T17:43:33.373Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- invision%20power%20board
item.description: Stored XSS in Invision Power Board versions 3.3.1 - 3.4.8 leads to Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-8272|2024-09-16T16:43:07.206Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- ultravnc
item.description: UltraVNC revision 1211 has multiple off-by-one vulnerabilities in VNC server code, which can potentially result in code execution. This attack appears to be exploitable via network connectivity. These vulnerabilities have been fixed in revision 1212.

item.title: CVE-2019-8267|2024-09-16T16:48:26.336Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- ultravnc
item.description: UltraVNC revision 1207 has out-of-bounds read vulnerability in VNC client code inside TextChat module, which results in a denial of service (DoS) condition. This attack appears to be exploitable via network connectivity. This vulnerability has been fixed in revision 1208.

item.title: CVE-2019-8265|2024-09-16T17:07:55.620Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- ultravnc
item.description: UltraVNC revision 1207 has multiple out-of-bounds access vulnerabilities connected with improper usage of SETPIXELS macro in VNC client code, which can potentially result in code execution. This attack appears to be exploitable via network connectivity. These vulnerabilities have been fixed in revision 1208.

item.title: CVE-2019-8270|2024-09-16T16:34:02.833Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- ultravnc
item.description: UltraVNC revision 1210 has out-of-bounds read vulnerability in VNC client code inside Ultra decoder, which results in a denial of service (DoS) condition. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity. This vulnerability has been fixed in revision 1211.
